DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: BERGAMASCHI, R. A.;Bergamaschi, R.A.;Bergamaschi, Reinaldo A.;Bergamaschi, Reinaldo;Bergamaschi, R.

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Possui graduao em Engenharia Eletronica pelo Instituto Tecnolgico de Aeronutica (ITA-1982), mestrado em Electronics Engineering - Philips International Institute (Holanda, 1984) e doutorado em Electronics and Computer Science - University of Southampton (Inglaterra, 1989). Apos o doutorado, Reinaldo trabalhou por mais de 18 anos no IBM T. J. Watson Research Center, Yorktown Heights, NY. Atualmente professor visitante da Universidade Estadual de Campinas, fundador da Odysci (Internet Startup) e consultor da CadComponents Inc. Tem experincia na reas de Cincia da Computao, Arquitetura de Sistemas de Computao, Hardware e architetura de processadores, Ferramentas de software para projeto de circuitos integrados, e metodologias de projeto de circuitos integrados.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Bachelors in Electronics Engineering from Instituto Tecnolgico de Aeronutica (Brazil, 1982), Masters in Electronics Engineering from Philips International Institute (The Netherlands, 1984) and PhD in Electronics and Computer Science from University of Southampton (UK, 1989). After his PHD, he worked for more than 18 years at the IBM T. J. Watson Research Center, Yorktown Heights, NY. Currently, Reinaldo is a visiting professor at the Institute of Computing, Campinas State University (UNICAMP), founder of Odysci (Internet Startup) and occasional consultant for CadComponents Inc. He has experience in the following areas: computer science and computer architecture, hardware and architecture of microprocessors, IC design tools and methodologies.

OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES:
Publicacoes: Ha' muitas outras publicacoes em conferencias da IEEE e ACM que nao estao listadas aqui no meu curriculo Lattes. O sistema nao consegue achar DOI's de conferencias automaticamente!
PROFESSIONAL ACTIVITIES: Program Committee member in the following conferences: - IEEE International High-Level Design, Validation and Test Workshop (HLDVT) in 1996 and 1997. - IEEE International Conference on Computer-Aided Design (ICCAD) in 1993, 1994, 1995, 1999, 2000 and 2001. - IEEE International Conference on Computer Design (ICCD) in 1993, 1994, and 1995. Publications chair in 1993 and 1994. - Design, Automation and Test in Europe (DATE) in 2000, 2001, 2002, 2003, 2004, 2005, 2006, 2007 and 2008. - Design Automation Conference (DAC) in 2004, 2005 - Asia-Pacific Design Automation Conference (ASP-DAC) in 2005 - International Conference on Hardware-Software Codesign and System Synthesis (CODES+ISSS) in 2003 and 2004. Panels chair in 2003. - International Symposium on System-Level Synthesis (ISSS) in 2000, 2001, 2002, Special Sessions Chair in 1999.
- I have served as a technical referee for: IEEE Transactions on Computer-Aided Design of Integrated Circuits and Systems, IEEE Transactions on VLSI Systems, IEEE Design & Test magazine, IEEE Computer magazine, Integration VLSI Journal, International Conference on Computer-Aided Design, International Conference on Computer Design, Design Automation Conference, International Symposium on System-Level Synthesis, National Science Foundation, Semiconductor Research Corporation.

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES: A Odysci e' uma startup incubada em Campinas. Nos desenvolvemos algoritmos e software para busca e ranqueamento de informacoes cientificas.
